panels.description: Compared to the requests. Pod using the most

targets.expr: max (sum by (pod)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace",container="webservice"}) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}))

panels.title: Webservice memory usage
